senses.sense_definition: Действительное причастие прошедшего времени от глагола <w>пропекать</w>.

examples.text: Повар, тщательно <w>пропекавший</w> каждый корж для торта, гордился своей работой.

target_lang_translations.en: The cook, who was carefully <w>baking</w> every cake layer <w>thoroughly</w>, was proud of his work.

examples.text: Сильный жар, <w>пропекавший</w> стены дома, заставлял жителей искать прохладу.

target_lang_translations.en: The intense heat, <w>baking</w> the walls of the house <w>through</w>, forced the residents to seek coolness.

target_lang_definitions.en: Past active participle of the verb 'to bake through'; describes a subject that was in the process of baking something completely or heat that was penetrating something thoroughly.

en.target_lang_sense_clarification: cooking something completely to the center
